attributes.action: Cancel the UK Covid Inquiry now
attributes.additional_details: We do not believe that the inquiry will hold those who imposed lockdowns or other damaging counter-Covid measures to account.
attributes.background: Cancel the Covid Inquiry now - we believe it's a waste of time and money.
